caption.p: Productivity of precursor treatment of hairy root culture yield and biomass cultivation. (A) Various concentrations of A 4 strain treatment of fresh weight of hairy root culture. (B) Various concentrations of A 4 strain treatment of dry weight of hairy root culture. (C) Various concentrations of R 1000 strain treatment of fresh weight of hairy root culture. (D) Various concentrations of R 1000 strain treatment of dry weight of hairy root culture.
